description: A sustainable technique used in desert regions to capture and store rainwater, enhancing soil moisture and supporting crop cultivation.
steps: Identify suitable land slopes for water collection.
Construct barriers to direct rainwater flow.
Create storage areas to allow water to spread across agricultural land.
Monitor soil moisture levels to assess effectiveness.
risks: Insufficient rainfall leading to inadequate water capture.
Soil erosion if barriers are not properly constructed.
Potential for water stagnation if not managed.
